titleStmt.title: A brief discovery of some of the blasphemous and seditious principles and practices of the people called Quakers taken out of their most noted and approved authors, humbly offered to the consideration of the King and both houses of Parliament / by Edward Beckham ... Hen. Meriton ... Lancaster Topcliffe ..., Norfolk.
titleStmt.author: Beckham, Edward, 1637 or 8-1714.
Meriton, Henry, d. 1707.
Topcliffe, Lancaster, 1646 or 7-1720.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
